meanings.definition: A strain of bacteria that has become resistant to antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: The superbug spread quickly in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are concerned about the rise of superbugs in healthcare settings.
meanings.sent3: The superbug walked into the antibiotic party, but no one wanted to dance with it.
meanings.sent4: The superbug was like a tiny superhero, immune to the attacks of antibiotics.
meanings.sent5: The superbug's resistance to antibiotics made it a formidable opponent in the battle against infection.

meanings.definition: An infectious microorganism that is difficult to treat with medication.
meanings.sent1: The superbug caused a serious outbreak in the community.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying ways to combat superbugs effectively.
meanings.sent3: The superbug tried to hide from the medication, but it was always found.
meanings.sent4: In the world of infections, the superbug reigned supreme, defying all treatments.
meanings.sent5: The threat of the superbug loomed large, challenging the effectiveness of traditional medicines.
